utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So uh - I guess we should - make it official huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh - Look Rach - Hey Ross is here! Hey look! It's my good friend Ross. Hey Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Joey. Hey you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey and look he brought flowers. Thanks Ross, but I'm really more of a candy guy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're weird today. Listen I uh, wanted to talk to you about something.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh yeah, actually I kinda need to talk to you too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh Joey, can you give us just a minute?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry. I meant no.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi! Hey look who's here!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Where's my granddaughter? I've been practicing my magic tricks.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He pulled a quarter out of my ear!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, where's uh, where's mom?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: She went to pick up Aunt Liddy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, Aunt Liddy's coming? That means we get five dollars each!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: So when do I get to meet Emma and show her this?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. Wow.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh Dad, Emma's in the nursery. I'll take you now. If you want, but I really want to talk to you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, I still need to talk to you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh hey but, before you guys do that I need to talk to you, and Ross, I need to talk to you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh and I need to talk to you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: About what?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: To see if you know what these guys are talking about.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Isn't she beautiful?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Look at her, my first grandchild.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What about Ben?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Well of course Ben, I meant my first granddaughter. Wow.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Have umm, have you thought anymore about you and Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh well yeah, actually I was going to talk to her when you guys all came in the room.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yay! It's so exciting! Wow, you could've done that with us there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh sure okay, you can touch yourself in front of us but you can't talk to Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! When have I ever touched myself in front of you guys?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh please! Just before when you were asleep in the lounge! That Armenian family was watching you instead of the TV. Oh, that reminds me. That Mr. Hasmeje still has my Gameboy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Chandler, can I talk to you for a second?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude I just did something terrible.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That was you?! I thought it was Jack!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No, that was Jack! Rachel thinks I asked her to marry me!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?! Why does she think that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Because it kinda looked like I did.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Again, what?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay well, I was down on one knee with the ring in my hand -

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: As we all are at some point during the day.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It wasn't my ring! It fell out of Ross's jacket! And when I knelt down to pick it up Rachel thought I was proposing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross had a ring?! And he was gonna propose?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I guess.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And you did it first?! This is gonna kill him! You know how much he loves to propose!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know! I know it's awful.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, what did she say?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She said yes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Does Ross know?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh God, what the hell am I going to tell him?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well maybe you don't have to tell him anything.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I like that. Yeah -

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If you clear things up with Rachel then Ross never needs to find out, but you have to do it now before he hears about it and kicks your ass!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now let's not get carried away.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I want a baby.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honey, we've been over this. I need to be facing the other way.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on! Come on, if we have sex again it'll double our chances of getting pregnant. Do you think that closet's still available?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm so tired. Yeah okay, but no foreplay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Deal!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dad seriously! Y'know you really should see someone about that!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Noted.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I wanna go talk to Rachel for a minute, are you gonna be okay alone for a bit?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Are you kidding me, I could stay and look at her forever.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Actually umm -

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you all right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uhh - I think I just got engaged.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! He did it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well - did you know he was gonna ask me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you kidding? I'm like the one who talked him into it. I like to think of myself as the puppet master of the group.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And you really think this is a good idea?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I just talked him into it, don't tell me I have to do you too. The puppet master gets tired, people.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I just don't know! It just doesn't feel right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why?! You two are so meant to be together, everybody thinks so.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?! Even Ross?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Especially Ross!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh uh, hey Pheebs. Uh y'know what? I'll-I'll come back later.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! Kind of uh, kind of a full house here. I'll guess just - I'll come back.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: There he goes, your fianc閑.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I guess so.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Although he does play with himself in his sleep.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can't say that I'm surprised.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dad, what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: I think there are people in there having sex.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It can't be me, I'm standing right here.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Wanna peek?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Come on!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know what? I don't like you without mom. Come on.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We're not peeking?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Well I'm peeking. Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello sir, you know Monica.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey uh, is it okay to come in?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Of course! Oh Joey, this ring I - it's beautiful! I love it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah uh look Rach, there's something I gotta tell ya.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: Hey! Are you ready to try nursing again?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! Hi Emma. Hey, why do you think she won't take my breast?

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: It's all right honey, it takes some babies a while to get it, but don't worry. It'll happen.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yowsa!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay sweetie, you can do it. Just open up and put it in your mouth.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dear Lord.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm sorry honey, what were you saying?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh uh-uh yeah, I think that -

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh look, she's pulling away again! Do you think my nipples are too big for her mouth? She looks scared. Doesn't she look scared?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y'know, I don't really know her.

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: Why don't we try massaging the breast to stimulate the flow.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you kidding me?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It's just so frustrating! Why doesn't she want my breast?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know! Maybe she's crazy!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh hey! Wait up!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Congratulations! I didn't want to say anything in front of Joey ‘cause I didn't know if he knew yet.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What, that we had a baby? Come on let's give him a little credit, although he did eat a piece of plastic fruit earlier.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! No, that you and Rachel are engaged!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it's a secret. Oh goodie! Yes! We haven't done the secret thing in a long time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe, there is no secret. Okay? I didn't propose.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you lying? Is this like that time you tried to convince us that you were a doctor?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am a doctor! Y'know what? I'm just gonna go and talk to Rachel myself.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, me too. Should we wake her up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No, come on let her sleep! She's so exhausted.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And so engaged.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Oh my God! She-she thinks we're engaged! Why? Why? Why would she think we're engaged?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Perhaps because you gave her an engagement ring? Y'know Ross, doctors are supposed to be smart.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I didn't give her that ring!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So whose ring is it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's mine.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Is it an engagement ring?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But you didn't give it to her?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But you were going to propose?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Huh, I might be losing interest in this.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look. Look, my mom gave me that ring because she wanted me to propose to Rachel, but all I wanted to do is see if she maybe - kinda - wanted ah - to start - things up again.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, what beautiful lukewarm sentiment.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I didn't want to rush into anything. And it seemed like she didn't want to either. But I don't, I don't understand how any of this happened! What? Did she find the ring in my jacket, assume that I was going to propose, throw it on, and-and just start telling people?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! No, she said you actually proposed to her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well I didn't! I didn't propose! Unless uh - Did I? I haven't slept in forty hours and - it does sound like something I would do.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, we can't stay in here forever.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I still can't believe my dad saw us having sex! He didn't make it to one of my piano recitals, but this he sees!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is okay. We're all adults here; there's nothing to be ashamed of. Now, let's put our underwear in our pockets and walk out the door.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi Dad! I can still call you that right?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Of course. I'll always be your dad.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I just want you to know that what you witnessed in there, that wasn't for fun.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It wasn't fun?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why? Why-why-would you—Wh-why - Look, I just don't want you to think that we're animals who do it whenever we want.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Oh, I don't think that. Before today I never thought of you two having sex at all. It was a simpler time.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The truth is, Dad, we're-we're trying.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, we're trying to get pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Oh my God! This is so exciting! Well, get back in there! I'll guard the door!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, that's okay dad, we-we can wait until later.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa-whoa! I don't think so! Aren't you ovulating?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Daddy?!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Well you gotta get at it princess! When your mother and I were trying to conceive you, whenever she was ovulating, bam, we did it. That's how I got my bad hip.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's funny, this conversation's how I got the bullet hole in my head.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: This one time I had my knee up on the sink and your mother, she was -

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Daddy! I don't think we need to hear about the specific positions you and mom had sex.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: You're right, you're right. This is about your positions. Now, what I saw in the closet is not the optimum position for conceiving a child, although it might feel good.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don't feel good right now.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: But pleasure is important, and it helps if the woman has an orgasm. You up to the task sailor?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Seriously sir, my brains? All over the wall.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey. I need to tell you something.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, now's a good time. I'm on my way to have my ears cut off.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey asked me marry him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey proposed to me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is he crazy?! You just had Ross's baby!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I-I said yes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! Are you crazy? You just had Ross's baby! It's-it's so inappropriate. No, it's worse than that. It's wrong. It's - It is bigger than mine!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know. Days of Our Lives, thank you very much.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You can't marry him!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why not? I don't want to do this alone! And he's such a sweet guy and he loves me so much.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well do you love him?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sure?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I mean whatever.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, the question is - do you really want to marry Joey?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. No, I don't. Could you be a dear and go tell him?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You still haven't told Rachel you weren't really proposing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! She had the ring on, she seemed so excited, and then she took her breast out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey, you have to tell her what's going on! And what did it look like?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I didn't look at it. Stupid baby's head was blocking most of it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Go and tell Rachel right now before Ross finds out.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, it's not that easy. She said she wanted to marry me. I don't want to hurt her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, look, just do it gently.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're right. You're right. I-I'll go tell her now before Ross finds out and I'll be gentle. I can do that. I am a gentle person. Oh, by the way. Two people screwing in there if you want to check that out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Listen, I um - I heard about the engagement.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Surprised?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And confused. Rach, sweetie, I-I um - I didn't propose to you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't think you do.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You didn't propose to me. Joey did.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Poor baby, you're so tired. Rach, I didn't propose to you, Joey didn't propose to you, and Chandler didn't propose to you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh - You didn't propose to me, Chandler didn't propose to me, but Joey did.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey proposed to you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can come back.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, wait! Wait-wait-wait! Joey, did you propose to her?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes you did!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Actually, technically, I didn't.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well then why did you give me a ring?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait! Whoa-whoa, you - you gave her the ring?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No, and I did not ask her to marry me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, you did!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I didn't!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, you did!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I didn't!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, you did! And don't you say, "No, I didn't!"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ahhh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: He was right there. He got down on one knee and proposed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Whoa! You were down on one knee?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, that looks bad. But I didn't - I didn't propose!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Then what did happen?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, what did happen?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, the ring fell on the floor and I went down to pick it up and you thought I was proposing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, but you said, "Will you marry me?"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I didn't!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, you did!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I didn't!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, you did—Oh my God you didn't! Well then why didn't you tell me that before?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well I tried, but people kept coming in and then you took your breast out!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Whoa! Hey! Whoa-whoa-whoa, you saw her breast?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'll tell you about it later. Be cool.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well then Joey, what the hell were you doing with an engagement ring?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It wasn't my ring! It's Ross's ring! That's why I felt so bad Rach, because he was going to propose.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You were gonna propose to me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uhh - No.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, this is awkward.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But I-I was going to see if y'know, maybe you uh, start dating again but that - I mean that-that was all, Rach.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, step up! I proposed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, you didn't!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh that's right. There's a lot going on here and I think I ate some bad fruit earlier.

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: Hey, she just woke up! She's hungry. Why don't we give this another try?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe you told her I was going to propose!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can't believe you're not going to propose!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I'm not going to rush into anything!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, dude, I totally understand. Usually after I have a baby with a woman I like to slow things down!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She's doing it Look, she's breast-feeding look!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah, it's beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: I'll come back for her later.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh wow, this feels weird.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good weird?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wonderful weird.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y'know what you guys? I'm uh, I'm gonna go too. And uh, I'm sorry about everything.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey don't worry, it was my mistake.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, Rach, I should've told you sooner. It's just that - Man! That kid is going to town!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She's perfect.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We're so lucky.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We really are.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I-I know it's not a proposal and I don't know where you are, but with everything that's been going on and with Emma and - I've been feeling -

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know. I know. I'm feeling -

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, well, that - Wow, okay, well, umm - then maybe, at least we can, we can talk about us again.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, maybe.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well good, okay. I-I, kind of think y'know if we - if - you're wearing the ring....

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wh-what's that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And you told Phoebe you were engaged.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm sorry, what?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: When you thought Joey proposed did - did you say yes?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Kids, I spoke to a doctor and picked up this pamphlets on how to get pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey dad!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Sorry to bother you again, but could you pass my pamphlets back? Thank you.
